item.title: US Steel details plans to invest $11B by 2028 across all business segments
item.description: United States Steel on Tuesday detailed an $11 billion growth plan with new owner Nippon Steel that includes modernizing the century-old steelmaker

item.title: Pizza Hut's parent company says it's considering selling the chain
